import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import NavBar from '../components/Navbar/NavBar'; import heroImg from '../images/web-dev.svg'; const Hero = () => { return ( <>

{/* We build digital solutions to help businesses scale */} Instant Voice-to-Text with Smart Archiving

Effortless voice-to-text, tackling the challenge of easy revisiting and searching in voice messages.
Try It Now {/* Get Started */} {/* Learn More */}
) } export default Hero;
